entry.title: Milestone 1 Update

The link to the code is available at below link - https://github.com/disdi/linux-on-litex-vexriscv/commit/e9f9c6b14bca11cca2195bd61f9c5334ead3221d

When Litex BIOS boots up, it shows all the peripherals needed to boot linux alongwith CTUCAN Controller in â€¦
entry.content:
CTUCAN Controller for Linux

We updated linux-on-litex project to integrate CTUCAN Controller booting over Linux.

The link to the code is available at below link - https://github.com/disdi/linux-on-litex-vexriscv/commit/e9f9c6b14bca11cca2195bd61f9c5334ead3221d

When Litex BIOS boots up, it shows all the peripherals needed to boot linux alongwith CTUCAN Controller in the memory region. The screenshoot below of Litex Console:

Next step is to modify linux kernel booting over the litex bitstream with CTUCAN Controller to enumerate a CAN device.
